sect1.title: Connectivity
sect1.para: The Connectivity layout is a mixture of the circular and hierarchical layout. Users need to select concepts in the network in which connectivity they are interested before opening the layout. The layout will show these selected concepts (in yellow) in a first circle. A second circle will be displayed to the right of the first one, showing all the concepts that are not connected to the concepts in the first circle. To the left of the first circle, a customisable number of rows are displayed showing a hierarchy of concepts. This hierarchy is based on the connectivity of the concepts in these rows to all the concepts in the first circle. The top row shows the concepts that are most connected.
